article_title: Ritz-Carlton opens in Rancho Mirage after Lehman limbo
article_text:
The president and chief operating officer of Ritz Carlton describes the newest hotel it just opened in Rancho Mirage, California.

Newest Ritz really something to behold

After seven years of planning and construction, Marriott opened its Ritz-Carlton in Rancho Mirage, California, this week.

With Lehman Brothers initially supporting this massive hotel project in the beginning stages, the collapse of the investment bank lead to major delays in building the Ritz Carlton's fourth hotel in California.

article_metadata.description: A new luxury hotel has opened in the California desert with 244 guest rooms and suites.
article_metadata.author: Ryan Ruggiero

og.description: A new luxury hotel has opened in the California desert with 244 guest rooms and suites.
